name: bidaya-lab-portal
description: نظام إدارة شامل لمعمل بداية للتحاليل الطبية

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w apps/backend" "npm run dev -w apps/frontend" "npm run dev -w apps/admin"
scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/database && npm run build -w apps/backend && npm run build -w apps/frontend && npm run build -w apps/admin
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w apps/backend && npm run lint -w apps/frontend && npm run lint -w apps/admin
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check -w apps/backend && npm run type-check -w apps/frontend && npm run type-check -w apps/admin
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:reset -w apps/backend && npm run db:seed -w apps/backend
scripts.clean: npm run clean -w apps/backend && npm run clean -w apps/frontend && npm run clean -w apps/admin
scripts.fresh-install: rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules && npm install

author: معمل بداية للتحاليل الطبية
